Nav.btn-client-mobile: Get Cozy Drive on your mobile!
Nav.banner-txt-client: Add your documents and photos to your Cozy from your computer: they will be safe and available at any moment!

desc.one-way: Contacts can view, download, and add the content to their Cozy. If they add the content to their Cozy, they will get updates you make to the content, but they won't be able to update it.
desc.two-way: Contacts can update, delete and add the content to their Cozy. Updates on the content will be seen on other Cozies.

Share.locked-type-file: Coming soon: you will be able to change permissions you grant on the file.
Share.locked-type-folder: Coming soon: you will be able to change permissions you grant on the folder.

permissionRequired.title: Save your contacts in your Cozy?
permissionRequired.desc: Authorize the application to access to your Cozy's contacts: you'll be able to select them next time.
permissionRequired.success: The application has access to your contacts

unavailable.title: Switch online!
unavailable.message: An internet connection is needed to display the list of your last sharings.

desc.ro: You can view, download, and add this content to your Cozy. You will get updates by the owner, but you won't be able to update this content yourself.
desc.rw: You can view, update, delete and add this content to your Cozy. Updates you make will be seen on other Cozies.

shareByLink.subtitle: By public link
shareByLink.desc: Anyone with the provided link can see and download your files.
shareByLink.copied: Link has been copied to clipboard

shareByEmail.subtitle: By email
shareByEmail.emailPlaceholder: Enter the email address or name of the recipient
shareByEmail.genericSuccess: You sent an invite to %{count} contacts.
shareByEmail.comingsoon: Coming soon! You will be able to share documents and photos in a single click with your family, your friends, and even your coworkers. Don't worry, we'll let you know when it's ready!
shareByEmail.onlyByLink: This %{type} can only be shared by link, because

revoke.title: Remove from sharing
revoke.desc: This contact will keep a copy but the changes won't be synchrnoized anymore.
revoke.success: You removed this shared file from %{email}.

revokeSelf.title: Remove me from sharing
revokeSelf.desc: You keep the content but it won't be updated between your Cozy anymore.
revokeSelf.success: You were removed from this sharing.

whoHasAccess.title: 1 person has access |||| %{smart_count} people have access

protectedShare.title: Coming soon!
protectedShare.desc: Share anything by email with your family and friends!

error.generic: An error occurred when creating the file share link, please try again.
error.revoke: Woops, an error occurred. Please contact us so we can fix this issue as soon as possible.

specialCase.base: This %{type} cannot be shared but with a link as it

Files.viewer-fallback: If the file has started downloading, you can close this.

dropzone.teaser: Drop files to upload them to:
dropzone.noFolderSupport: Folder drag&drop is currently not supported by your browser. Please upload your files manually.

deleteconfirmation.title: Delete this element? |||| Delete these elements?
deleteconfirmation.trash: It will be moved to the Trash. |||| They will be moved to the Trash.
deleteconfirmation.restore: You can still restore it whenever you want. |||| You can still restore them whenever you want.
deleteconfirmation.shared: The following contacts whom you shared it with will keep a copy but your changes won't be synchronized anymore. |||| The following contacts whom you shared them with will keep a copy but your changes won't be synchronized anymore
deleteconfirmation.referenced: Some of the files within the selection are related to a photo album. They will be removed from it if you proceed to trash them.

emptytrashconfirmation.title: Permanently delete?
emptytrashconfirmation.forbidden: You won't be able to access these files anymore.
emptytrashconfirmation.restore: You won't be able to restore these files if you didn't make a backup.

destroyconfirmation.title: Permanently delete?
destroyconfirmation.forbidden: You won't be able to access this file anymore. |||| You won't be able to access these files anymore.
destroyconfirmation.restore: You won't be able to restore this file if you didn't make a backup. |||| You won't be able to restore these files if you didn't make a backup.

quotaalert.title: Your disk space is full :(
quotaalert.desc: Please remove files and empty your trash before uploading files again.

empty.title: You don‚Äôt have any files in this folder.
empty.text: Click the "upload" button to add files to this folder.
empty.trash_title: You don‚Äôt have any deleted files.
empty.trash_text: Move files you don't need anymore to the Trash and permanently delete items to free up storage page.

error.open_folder: Something went wrong when opening the folder.

download_file.offline: You should be connected to download this file

Error.public_unshared_title: Sorry, this link is no longer available.
Error.public_unshared_text: This link has expired, or it was removed by its owner. Let him or her know that you missed it!

alert.could_not_open_file: The file could not be opened
alert.try_again: An error has occurred, please try again in a moment.
alert.restore_file_success: The selection has been successfully restored.
alert.trash_file_success: The selection has been moved to the Trash.
alert.destroy_file_success: The selection has been deleted permanently.
alert.empty_trash_progress: Your trash is being emptied. This might take a few moments.
alert.folder_name: The element %{folderName} already exists, please choose a new name.
alert.folder_generic: An error occurred, please try again.
alert.folder_abort: You need to add a name to your new folder if you would like to save it. Your information has not been saved.
alert.offline: This feature is not available offline.

welcome.title: Cozy Drive
welcome.desc: Create a Cozy or sign in to access Cozy Drive

server_selection.title: Sign in
server_selection.label: Address of my Cozy
server_selection.wrong_address_with_email: You typed an email address. To connect on your cozy you must type its url, something like https://camillenimbus.mycozy.cloud
server_selection.wrong_address_v2: You have just entered the address of old Cozy version. This application is only compatible with the latest version. [Please refer to our site for more information.](https://blog.cozycloud.cc/post/2016/11/21/On-the-road-to-Cozy-version-3?lang=en)
server_selection.wrong_address: This address doesn‚Äôt seem to be a cozy. Please check the address you provide.
server_selection.wrong_address_cosy: Woops, the address is not correct. Try with "cozy" with a "z"!

files.title: Access your drive
files.description: In order to save your Cozy Drive on your device, the application must access your files.

photos.title: Backup your photos and videos
photos.description: Automatically backup the photos taken with your phone to your Cozy, so you never lose them.

contacts.title: Sync your contacts
contacts.description: Save your phone's contact on your Cozy ‚Äî this will facilitate sharing files with them.

analytics.title: Help us improve Cozy
analytics.description: The application will automatically provide data (mainly errors) to Cozy Cloud. It will allow us to resolve problems faster.

unlink.title: Reset this application
unlink.description: By clicking Reset, you will be able to start your application over, and will only lose the data saved on your smartphone.

confirmation.title: Reset this application?
confirmation.description: By logging out of your Cozy, you will erase all data synchronized locally by your mobile application.

images.title: Backup images
images.label: Backup your images automatically to your Cozy not to ever lose them and share them easily.

wifi.title: Backup on WIFI only
wifi.label: If the option is enabled, your device will only backup photos when it's on WIFI in order to save your package.

analytics.title: Help us improve Cozy
analytics.label: The application will automatically provide data (mainly errors) to Cozy Cloud. It will allow us to resolve problems faster.

feedback.title: Help improve Cozy Drive
feedback.description: Send your feedback to help us improve Cozy Drive. Click on the button below, explain the problem or make a suggestion and send it. You're done!

logs.title: Help us to understand your problem
logs.description: Send the application log to help us improve its quality and stability.
logs.success: Thanks, we will investigate your problem and contact you soon.
logs.error: A problem happened, logs couldn't be sent, please try again.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Import contacts
contacts.text: Import the contacts from your device to your Cozy to easily share content with them.

open_with.offline: You should be connected to open this file
open_with.noapp: No application can open this file

make_available_offline.offline: You should be connected to open this file
make_available_offline.noapp: No application can open this file

revoked.title: Access revoked
revoked.description: It appears you revoked this device from your Cozy. If you didn't, please let us know at contact@cozycloud.cc. All your local data related to your Cozy will be removed.

feedback.title: Would you mind giving us some feedback?

email.subject: Feedback on Cozy Drive
email.placeholder: Hello, I think Cozy Drive would be better if‚Ä¶

alert.declined: Awesome. You will love the upcoming features. Stay Cozy!
alert.later: No problem, we'll ask again later.
alert.feedback: Thank you for the feedback. We'll definitely work on it!

first_sync.title: You are about to start your first photos back up üéâ
first_sync.tip_bed: Open Cozy Drive before you go to bed or when you don't use your phone.
first_sync.tip_wifi: Enable Wi-Fi to preserve your data.
first_sync.result: In the morning, all your photos will be stored in a safe and secure location.

notifications.backup_paused: Your photos backup is paused. Keep the application open and prevent the screen from going to sleep to complete the backup.

alert.success: %{smart_count} file uploaded with success. |||| %{smart_count} files uploaded with success.
alert.success_conflicts: %{smart_count} file uploaded with %{conflictNumber} conflict(s). |||| %{smart_count} files uploaded with %{conflictNumber} conflict(s).
alert.errors: Errors occurred during the file upload.
alert.network: You are currenly offline. Please try again once you're connected.

alert.error: Unable to automatically upload the file, please upload it manually with the upload menu.

UploadQueue.header: Uploading %{smart_count} photo to Cozy Drive |||| Uploading %{smart_count} photos to Cozy Drive

cta.installDesktop: Install the synchronization tool for your computer
cta.accessFiles: Access your files directly on your computer

loading.error: This file could not be loaded. Do you have a working internet connection right now?

error.noapp: No application found to handle this file.
error.generic: An error occurred when opening this file, please try again.

Move.title: %{smart_count} element |||| %{smart_count} elements
Move.success: %{subject} has been moved to %{target}. |||| %{smart_count} elements have been moved to %{target}.
Move.error: Something went wrong while moving this element, please try again later. |||| Something went wrong while moving these elements, please try again later.
Move.cancelled: %{subject} has been moved back to it's original location. |||| %{smart_count} elements have been moved back to their original location.
Move.cancelled_error: Sorry, there was an error while moving the element back. |||| Sorry, there was an error while moving these elements back.

updated.title: GDPR comes into reality !
updated.detail: In the context of the General Data Protection Regulation, [our Terms of Service have been updated](%{link}) and will apply to all our Cozy users on May 25, 2018.
updated.error: Something went wrong, please try again later
